Banner of the Northern Star

two handed weapon (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 107
magic resistance [mr]: -2
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #761 Light of the Northern Star
weap id [weapon]: 100 (Standard)
resource cost [rcost]: 3
damage [dmg]: 1
attack [att]: -2
defence [def]: -3
length [len]: 4
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
Material Composition: Flammable
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Nonmagical, Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 25S to forge (S4)

This banner calls down light from the Northern Star, making all Astral mages on the battlefield more powerful. The banner's wielder will have his protection against magic decreased due to the Astral power rushing through him.
